name: Tunnel Rush !
description:
Dodging is the name of the game Tunnel Rush, a fast-paced action game influenced by Run 3. In a tunnel bursting with color at blazing speed, you must avoid obstacles of different shapes. To prevent the incoming barriers, you must be agile and precise enough to see its position and move quickly away from it. This game will test your focus, speed, flexibility as well as eye and hands coordination. See how far you can go and play against other online players. Will you make it to the top of the leaderboard?

Features:
- Easy Navigation
- Tunnels with colorful and artistic design
- Obstacles in different shapes and sizes.
- A leaderboard that will challenge you to get a higher score
